Summary: Blimp-Like Object seen over Milan, Michigan
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Milan
There were no other sightings in Milan on or around October 17th 1973
divs: Sighting DetailsI was returning home from a meeting and had just reached the US 23 overpass onSherman Road when I saw the blimp-like object hovering in the distance over aneighbors house. The object was East and to the North slightly, when firstobserved. It moved hovering slowly across my path and disappeared headingsouth.The object resembled a large blimp like structure with flashing colored lights(red and green). As I drove closer I noticed that it did not have a tail likeblimps. I rolled the window down expecting sounds of activity, but there was nonoise. It gave me a rather eerie feeling for a couple of minutes as though Iwere being watched and then it suddenly disappeared taking off. It suddenlyseemed to gain energy and swiftly move out of sight before I could get a betterlook at it. It left like a bullet from a gun.
